message.body: Hello jeremy and kennedy, thank you very much for your reply. We already found a host, but really appreciate it. Maybe we can meet up tomorrow if u want.
We're taking a tour at ten, and will be around the city until six. Asaf and alyssa
Great! We're both working all day tomorrow so won't be able to meet :-( but enjoy Philly!
Thanks, we will, or are actually. Maybe next time then. Have a nice day tomorrow.
